Virtual CircuitsÂ¶

OSCARS 1.0 serves as the automated resource allocation engine to dynamically establish virtual circuits on ESnet. A virtual circuit (commonly referred to more simply as circuit throughout this documentation) provides a dedicated portion of bandwidth according to the user’s desired schedule, service, and path requirements. This page discusses how to request circuits.
